title: How to Add an Image in Word

steps.title: Click in the document.
steps.content: Click in the document. Do so near the place you want to insert the picture.

steps.title: Click the Insert tab.
steps.content: Click the Insert tab. It's at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click Pictures on the left side of the tool bar.
steps.content: Click Pictures on the left side of the tool bar. In some versions of Word, you may need to click Insert in the menu bar at the top of the screen, then select Pictures .

steps.title: Select a location from which to add the image.
steps.content: Select a location from which to add the image. Click From File… to locate and select the image file on your computer. Click Photo Browser… if you want Word to search for image files on your computer.

steps.title: Click the image you want to add.
steps.content: Click the image you want to add.

steps.title: Click Insert.
steps.content: Click Insert . The image will be placed in the Word document where you clicked. Click and hold on the photo to move or drag it to another location. You can also edit the image in the Word document .

steps.title: Find an image you want to copy.
steps.content: Find an image you want to copy. It can be from the Web, another document, or your photos library.

steps.title: Click Copy.
steps.content: Click Copy . If your Mac doesn't have a right click function, Control +click or click with two fingers on your trackpad.

steps.title: Right-click in the document.
steps.content: Right-click in the document. Do so near the place you want to insert the picture.

steps.title: Click Paste.
steps.content: Click Paste . The image will be placed in the Word document where you clicked. Click and hold on the photo to move or drag it to another location. You can also edit the image in the Word document .

steps.title: Locate the image you want to add.
steps.content: Locate the image you want to add. Find the image file on your computer in a folder, a window, or on your desktop.

steps.title: Click and hold on the image file.
steps.content: Click and hold on the image file.

steps.title: Drag it into an open Word document and release the click.
steps.content: Drag it into an open Word document and release the click. The image will be placed in the Word document where you dropped it. Click and hold on the photo to move or drag it to another location. You can also edit the image in the Word document .
